title: Biden Flags for $6
selftext:
I wouldn't normally post this as I would much rather have you buy from the campaign. But if you want a 3' x 5' Biden flag and couldn't afford it before, here is your chance.

#Only $6 with free two day Prime shipping

* https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B088DQC37Q/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1



Donate your savings to the campaign if you want.
